title: ellAm avan sheyal
sahitya:
ellAm avan sheyal enreNNi manadil shAnta inbuTriruppOr periyOr inba tunbam


anupallavi

 ellA ulagum Ishan viLaiyATTu eLiyOrgaL ellAm sOdarar enra paranda anbarivOrum


caraNam    anjin shErkkaiyE inda anitya uDal (bhUtam) maN
 peNNAshaip-perukkE janma tunbangaLukkum hEtu
 nenjil vETrumai tOnra paDarum agjnAna iruL
 nIrum pAlumAi nirai samarasa jnAna aruL
